thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 11 of 3538
thread.title: Jean

author: Jean
title: Jean
text: They have a huge selection of all kinds of books at great prices. I have changed back to buying used books instead of e-books since e-book pricing has gotten ridiculous. Thrift books has a buyers bonus program and other special price offers, their purchasing quota for free shipping is an extremely easy to reach $10 and they also allow other coupons without hassle. They usually ship within 24 hours of ordering so I haven't experienced prolonged waiting periods for my books Very happy with this company.
